domain.description: Enum value representing the source from which the message was sent. It is a number representing which processor core in a multi-core SoC generated the log message.

lvl.description: Enum value for the log level: [1: ERR, 2: WRN, 3: INF, 4: DBG]

msg.description: The message data that was logged

ts.description: Unix timestamp given in milliseconds when the data was sampled

seq.description: Sequence number of the message. This is a counter, used for ordering message if `ts` not available/used
